General.Name: Shenzhen Energy Group Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Shenzhen Energy Group Co., Ltd. engages in the development, production, purchase, and sale of various conventional and new energy sources in China. The company operates low-carbon, natural gas, wind power, photovoltaic, garbage, hydropower, and other clean energy power plants. It is also involved in the supply of gas and municipal solid waste treatment businesses. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Energy Investment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Energy Group Co., Ltd. in April 2008. Shenzhen Energy Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
